ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tmr_run
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Flag to indicate if internal counter is running or not

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cont
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set internal counter behaviour to continuous or single-shot

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: load_val
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Value loaded to the internal counter

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: snap_val
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: A snapshot of the internal counter value
